description: Scenario forced experiment with prescribed land surface climatology derived from modern conditions from the first historical ensemble member (1980-2014). SST and sea-ice from the first ensemble members of the historical and ssp585 experiments.
keywords: LS3MIP, Tier 2, Historical Scenario, Prescribed land, prescribed SST
long_name: prescribed modern land surface climatology from historical, prescribed SST and sea-ice from historical plus scenario runs
rationale: Diagnose land-climate feedback over land. To diagnose the role of land-atmosphere feedback at climate time scales. To isolate the role of the ocean in propagating the damping/reinforcing land surface responses on climate.

requirements.description: Historical scenario, from 1980 to the end of the 21st century
